synopsis.text: Sanka Rea is a sweet girl who unexpectedly claims to have become a zombie. She encounters Furuya Chihiro, a boy with a strange fondness for the undead. Chihiro had recently lost his cat Babu and asks Rea to use her new zombie powers to resurrect it. Despite their decaying bodies, Rea and the undead Babu attempt to live normal lives. Rea attends school, where her supernatural strength comes in handy. Babu takes a liking to another female cat, but stops the relationship upon becoming confused about his condition. Later, a scientist studying zombies arrives in Japan, presenting ample opportunities to examine the strange duo. Rea and Chihiro both grapple with balancing ordinary teenage life with Rea's bizarre affliction.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
